attributes.action: encourage employers to create a 4 day working week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would not only improve the Nations carbon footprint by reducing the volume of peak time traffic we believe that it would significantly help employers to reduce time lost to sickness and generally improve the moral of employees there by increasing productivity. Additional hours to be worked each day and day off to be staggered to reduce traffic volumes across the whole week and reduce overall congestion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
